item.description:
WE WILL BE MEETING IN THE OTHER CONFERENCE ROOM (SMALLER ONE) ON THE LEFT SIDE OF THE BUILDING.
Our next meeting will be on Tuesday, July 28th at the Reading Public Library.

Our last meeting was not well attended but those that came shared a great deal of themselves and made us all understand how difficult living in chronic pain can be.

This month please come with information on herbs, supplements and/or techniques that help you feel better or cope better with the pain of Fibromyalgia and chronic myofascial pain.


Betsy

I forgot to collect donations last time, please understand I pay for the room and the meetup costs each month and I am not meeting those expenses through donations at this time.

Thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the briefcase and all the papers in front of me.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia July Meetup
